content.chorus:
He wants you to repent
And have a new life in you
He wants you to repent
And have a new life in you today
verses:
The Lord's calling today
He's calling you
He has something for you
To set you free

Your money in the bank
He knows it all
All your sins back at your home
He sees it all

Teachers hear Him today
He knows you all
Traders seek him today
He longs for you

Workers meet him today
He gives you work
Richmen what of yourself
Who makes you rich

One day just one day
This world will end
The beer that you drink
Will be no more
